# Welcome! {-}

This is the class site for Statistical Machine Learning (STAT 253) at Macalester College for Spring 2022. The content here was made by [Bryan Martin](https://bryandmartin.github.io) and draws upon our class textbook, the 2nd edition of [An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R](https://www.statlearning.com/), and on materials prepared by [Brianna Heggeseth](https://bcheggeseth.github.io), [Alicia Johnson](https://ajohns24.github.io), and [Leslie Myint](https://lmyint.github.io).
